landing.title1: Every tool you need to work with PDFs in one place
landing.text1: Every tool you need to use PDFs, at your fingertips. All are 100% FREE and esay to use! Merge, Split, Compress, Convert, Rotate, Unlock and watermark PDFs with just a few clicks

section2.title: Register For Free Account
section2.item3: All your files in one place

merge.name: pdfmerge
merge.title: Merge PDF
merge.description: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available

split.name: pdfsplit
split.title: Split PDF
split.description: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files

compress.name: pdfcompress
compress.title: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality

pdf_word.name: pdf_word
pdf_word.title: PDF to Word
pdf_word.description: Easily convert your PDF files into easy to edit DOC and DOCX documents. The converted WORD document is almost 100% accurate.

word_pdf.name: word_pdf
word_pdf.title: Word to PDF
word_pdf.description: Make DOC and DOCX files easy to read by converting them to PDF.

sign.name: sign_pdf
sign.title: Sign PDF
sign.description: Sign yourself or request electronic signatures from others.

edit.name: edit_pdf
edit.title: Edit PDF
edit.description: Add text, images, shapes or freehand annotations to a PDF document. Edit the size, font, and color of the added content.

rotate.name: rotate_pdf
rotate.title: Rotate PDF
rotate.description: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!
